title: BRIEF-U.S. Commerce Sec Ross Says Trade Deficit With India "Too High"
text:
BRIEF-U.S. Commerce Sec Ross Says Trade Deficit With India "Too High"

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 13:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-U.S. Commerce Sec Ross Says Trade Deficit With India "Too High" Oct 3 (Reuters) - * INDIA TRADE MINISTER SAYS TRADE WITH U.S. "ROBUST" * U.S. COMMERCE SEC ROSS SAYS TRADE DEFICIT WITH INDIA "TOO HIGH" * INDIA TRADE MINISTER ON E-COMMERCE: CANNOT LET SMALL RETAIL DIE, THEREFORE LIMITED FDI INVESTMENT * INDIA TRADE MINISTER SAYS TRADE DISCUSSIONS PROGRESSING "SMOOTHLY" WITH U.S. * U.S. COMMERCE SEC ROSS SAYS HAVE SERIOUS STRUCTURAL ISSUES WITH CHINA * U.S. COMMERCE SEC ROSS ON 5G: HOPE INDIA DOES NOT INADVERTENTLY SUBJECT ITSELF TO UNTOWARD SECURITY RISK * U.S. COMMERCE SEC ROSS SAYS DON'T THINK INDIA IS UNFAIRLY TREATED RELATIVE TO OTHER COUNTRIES

BRIEF-U.S. Commerce Sec Ross Says Trade Deficit With India "Too High"
description: BRIEF-U.S. Commerce Sec Ross Says Trade Deficit With India "Too High"
